nodes.text: Green Three was the call sign of the third member of Green Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several pilots went by the call sign Green Three.
Rebel Alliance pilot Adam Swiftgale used this call sign during the evacuation of Hoth.

A year later, Tycho Celchu flew an A-wing as Green Three during the Battle of Endor, flying top cover for the Millennium Falcon and following Red Leader Wedge Antilles into the superstructure of the second Death Star.

Two and a half years after the Battle of Endor, New Republic pilot Rhysati Ynr used the call sign Green Three in a simulation of the Redemption scenario while training to qualify for membership in the reformed Rogue Squadron.
